channel.title: Emiliano Bonassi / @emilianobonassi
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @emilianobonassi. Generated by nitter.freedit.eu

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: Posts on Zora are now instantly tradable coins.
+ Each post is a coin with a supply of 1 billion + Creators automatically receive 10 million coins at launch + Creators earn 1% of every trade
Coin it. Trade it. Discover the value of your posts.
item.dc:creator: @zora
item.description:
Posts on Zora are now instantly tradable coins.

+ Each post is a coin with a supply of 1 billion
+ Creators automatically receive 10 million coins at launch
+ Creators earn 1% of every trade

Coin it. Trade it. Discover the value of your posts.

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: NFTScan is officially on Conduit Marketplace.
Built by the same team behind @Mint_Blockchain, @nftscan_com has the biggest NFT database spanning 20+ blockchains, providing professional and comprehensive NFT data services to web3 users and developers.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
NFTScan is officially on Conduit Marketplace.

Built by the same team behind @Mint_Blockchain, @nftscan_com has the biggest NFT database spanning 20+ blockchains, providing professional and comprehensive NFT data services to web3 users and developers.

item.title:

Two essential tools that can make your rollup better, from one of the best teams in crypto.

item.title:

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: You can add @AcrossProtocol to your rollup on Conduit Marketplace.
Across is the pioneer of intents-based bridging, providing interoperability across 18 chains and counting ‚Äì chains like @Optimism, @Arbitrum One, @base, @zora, @modenetwork, and more.

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: It doesn‚Äôt cost $10 million to launch a rollup.
But more importantly, you‚Äôre thinking about rollup costs all wrong.
Study Nvidia. Study Jensen Huang.
‚ÄúOur total cost of operations is so good that even when competitors‚Äô chips are free, it‚Äôs not cheap enough.‚Äù

item.title:
